text:
@PressSec @realDonaldTrump 1% of U.S. tested is behind 41 other countries!
U.S. has just 4.2% of World Population yet
U.S has 30.8% of World Coronavirus Cases, 
U.S has 23.5% of World Coronavirus Deaths!
Obvious & clear example how badly Trump failed
U.S. tested only 3,295,916 out of 330,065,019 Americans
